memberdef.argsstring: (const cugraph_resource_handle_t *handle, cugraph_graph_t *graph, size_t k, cugraph_k_core_degree_type_t degree_type, const cugraph_core_result_t *core_result, bool_t do_expensive_check, cugraph_k_core_result_t **result, cugraph_error_t **error)
memberdef.name: cugraph_k_core

briefdescription.para: Perform k_core using output from core_number.

parameterdescription.para: The value of k to use
Compute core_number using in, out or both in and out edges. Ignored if core_result is specified.
Result from calling cugraph_core_number, if NULL then call core_number inside this function call.
A flag to run expensive checks for input arguments (if set to true).
Pointer to an error object storing details of any error. Will be populated if error code is not CUGRAPH_SUCCESS
